name: Whitehaven Express Day Tour
description: Embark on an unforgettable adventure to Whitehaven Beach, where you can indulge in a quintessential Aussie experience. This tour is perfect for those seeking relaxation and exploration, offering more time to enjoy the stunning natural beauty of the Whitsundays. Capture breathtaking views as you cruise along the full length of Whitehaven Beach, and immerse yourself in the local history with guided walks. Ideal for families, couples, and solo travelers looking to connect with nature and enjoy a laid-back beach day.
includes:
Aussie beach BBQ - cooked to order
Complimentary stinger suit (seasonal)
A cruise along the full length of Whitehaven Beach
Optional guided walk to lookout
More time at Whitehaven Beach
More time for exploring the look-out & beautiful Betty's Beach
Guided bush walk to the look-out with local guide
Guided walk to the beach - learn about the history of this pristine area
Fair dinkum Aussie BBQ lunch on Whitehaven Beach
Steaks cooked to order
Cold beverages taken ashore for purchase
Morning tea & coffee with bickies
Afternoon cheese & biscuits
Complimentary return transfers to your accommodation
highlights:
Experience a cruise along the full length of Whitehaven Beach
Enjoy an Aussie BBQ lunch prepared on the beach
Take part in guided walks to explore the lookout and Betty's Beach
Relax with complimentary return transfers to your accommodation
Capture stunning views and moments along the journey
ideal_for: Families, couples, and solo travelers seeking a blend of relaxation and exploration in a stunning natural setting.
